name: tm28
effect: Teaches Dig to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Dig to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Digs underground the 1st turn, then strikes next turn.
flavor_text.emerald: Digs underground the 1st turn, then strikes next turn.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: An attack that hits on the 2nd turn. Can also be used to exit dungeons.
